subject: p10268877
raw_hist: -year-old male with arrest, question pneumonia, pneumothorax.
raw_find: Single AP portable chest radiograph is obtained. Tracheostomy tube is present. There is no pneumothorax or pleural effusion. There is a hazy veil-like opacity in the right upper lung zone which may be consolidation, atelectasis or artifact. Heart size appears enlarged however, this may be technical due to AP view. Bony structures are intact.
raw_impr: Limited study with hazy opacity in the right upper and mid lungs which may be infectious in etiology, atelectasis or artifact.
